weekly_top_story.headline: CMS Releases CY 2027 Advance Notice for MA and Part D
weekly_top_story.summary: CMS released proposed changes to Medicare Advantage risk adjustment and Part D on January 26, 2026, to better reflect current costs, potentially reshaping reimbursement and plan operations for providers nationwide.

stories.headline: CMS Issues ANPRM to Strengthen American-Made PPE and Essential Medicines Supply Chains
stories.summary: On January 26, 2026, CMS sought public feedback on bolstering domestic supply chains for PPE and essential medicines, aiming to reduce vulnerabilities exposed by past shortages and enhance healthcare resilience.

stories.headline: NIH Announces Reestablishment of Sickle Cell Advisory Committee
stories.summary: NIH reestablished the Sickle Cell Disease Advisory Committee on or around January 27, 2026, to guide research priorities and long-range planning, signaling renewed federal focus on this critical area.
